title: League Patcher opens but Client won't after Launch
body:
Patcher opens up just fine, however my client is having a hard time opening up.

The process for the client is running meaning the window should pop up however it never did.

Sometimes if I'm lucky it will pop up.

I also repatched everything but it still happens.

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be a Firewall/Antivirus blocking this from happening. This can typically be resolved by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to configure your network settings to work with League.

Let me know if this helped.

It's not my firewall, I tested by disabling my firewall however my client still won't pop up (but my patcher is popping up just fine)

repaired it about 3 times

and uninstall and reinstall about 2 times

It sounds like this is more of a complicated issue than what we normally see here on H&S. I'd like you to run some system logs with our [Hextech Tool,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can assist you further with troubleshooting this.

Let me know if you have issues completing those steps.

[I am having the same problem too.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/7BZ1Mn81-unable-to-launch-the-lol-client-launch-button-does-nothingno-eula-showing-up-to-accept)
Do you have the PBE client installed along with the new alpha client by any chance?
Have you noticed that the EULA/Disclaimer no longer appears for you to click accept?
